Text.text: To check that multi areas display correctly on the map.

1. Check that the map loads and it displays 2 multi areas. A purple one at the left and a green one at the right. As opposed to a simple area which is made of only one area, the multi area contains more polygons of the same color (see the north-western area of the purple multi area).
2. ONLY FOR DEVICES WITH A MOUSE: hover any of the green polygons. You should get a tooltip saying 'ZIP code zone: 1'
3. ONLY FOR DEVICES WITH A MOUSE: hover any of the purple polygons. You should get a tooltip saying 'ZIP code zone: 2'
